title: Lower Priority Queue
body: How long does it take for it to reset back to 5 minutes?

replies.body: Are you still experiencing an issue with this?  The timer and number of games for lower priority queue can only be reduced by completing the remaining matches.  It's then important to consistently play without interruptions to return to good standing and prevent escalated timers.    More information can also be found in our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), but please let me know if you have any questions.
